question: A train travels 240 km in 3 hours. What is its average speed in km/h?
If a rectangular garden is 12 meters long and 8 meters wide, what is its area in square meters?
A store sells apples for $2.50 each. If you buy 7 apples, how much do you pay?
A car uses 8 liters of fuel per 100 km. How many liters are needed for a 350 km trip?
If 3 workers can paint a house in 12 days, how many days would it take 4 workers to paint the same house?
A circle has a radius of 7 cm. What is its area? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
Sarah has 156 books. She donates 1/4 of them and then buys 23 more. How many books does she have now?
A shirt originally costs $80. It is on sale for 25% off. What is the sale price?
The sum of three consecutive integers is 72. What is the largest of the three?
A water tank can hold 500 liters. If it fills at a rate of 12.5 liters per minute, how many minutes does it take to fill completely?
A baker makes 144 cookies and packs them in boxes of 12. He sells each box for $8. What is the total revenue?
A student scored 85, 92, 78, and 95 on four tests. What is their average score?
A rope is 15.6 meters long. It is cut into pieces each 1.2 meters long. How many pieces are there?
If the population of a town doubles every 10 years, and it currently has 5,000 people, what will the population be in 30 years?
A car traveling at 60 km/h takes 4 hours for a journey. How long would the same journey take at 80 km/h?
A rectangular swimming pool is 25 meters long, 10 meters wide, and 2 meters deep. What is its volume in cubic meters?
John earns $15 per hour. He works 8 hours a day, 5 days a week. What is his weekly income?
A triangle has a base of 14 cm and a height of 9 cm. What is its area?
If you invest $1,000 at 5% simple interest per year, how much interest do you earn in 3 years?
A recipe calls for 2.5 cups of flour for 4 servings. How many cups are needed for 10 servings?
The ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:5. If there are 40 students total, how many boys are there?
A cylindrical water bottle has a radius of 3 cm and height of 20 cm. What is its volume? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
A marathon is 42.195 km. If a runner completes it in 3 hours, what is their average speed in km/h?
A library has 3,250 books. 18% of them are fiction. How many fiction books are there?
Two trains leave the same station in opposite directions. One travels at 70 km/h and the other at 90 km/h. After 2 hours, how far apart are they?
A cube has edges of length 5 cm. What is its surface area?
If 1 US dollar equals 83 Indian rupees, how many rupees is $250?
A factory produces 480 units in an 8-hour shift. What is the production rate per minute?
The temperature was -8°C in the morning and rose by 15°C by afternoon. What was the afternoon temperature?
A pizza is cut into 8 equal slices. If 3 people each eat 2 slices, what fraction of the pizza remains?
A parking lot charges $3 for the first hour and $1.50 for each additional hour. How much does it cost to park for 5 hours?
If a ladder of 13 meters reaches a window 12 meters high, how far is the base of the ladder from the wall?
A bag contains 4 red, 6 blue, and 5 green marbles. What is the probability of drawing a blue marble?
A clock loses 3 minutes every hour. After 8 hours, how many minutes has it lost?
A farmer has 120 meters of fencing. He wants to enclose a square field. What is the maximum area he can enclose?
Three friends split a bill of $87.60 equally. How much does each person pay?
A car deprecates by 15% each year. If it was bought for $20,000, what is it worth after 1 year?
How many seconds are there in 2 hours and 15 minutes?
A boat travels upstream at 10 km/h and downstream at 14 km/h. What is the speed of the current?
If a square has a diagonal of 10 cm, what is the length of each side? (Round to 2 decimal places)
